      • isColliding

        public static boolean isColliding(int x,
                                  int y,
                                  int width,
                                  int height)
        Check if an objects X & Y co-ordinates or width & height overlaps the Towers X & Y co-ordinates, or width & height
        Parameters:
        x - The X co-ordinate of the object to check
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the object to check
        width - The width of the object to check
        height - The height of the object to check
        Returns:
        true if the values overlap, false if the values do not overlap
